amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 11012, which requires that any savings from future Standard Reinsurance Agreements be put back into the Federal crop insurance program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 48 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to strike section 11012 of the Federal Agricultural Reform and Risk Management Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carney amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 252 (Roll no. 277).
